channel.title: Welcome to my blog! :tada: on Sonal's Blog :tada:
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my blog! :tada: on Sonal's Blog :tada:

item.title: Handling Login Popups in Selenium WebDriver and Java
item.description: Login Popup are a common sight in web applications. Learn how to handle these Login Popus in Selenium Webdriver and Java effectively.

item.title: Page Object Model with Playwright + Java
item.description: Learn the basics of creating a framework for POM in Playwright and Java.

item.title: Download file using Playwright Java
item.description: Article showing how to handle downloading of files in Playwright.

item.title: Understanding Role of Thread.sleep in Selenium
item.description: This guide discusses the role of Thread Sleep Command in Selenium Java, how and when to use it effectively.

item.title: Playwright Inspector | Playwright Debugging
item.description: See how to record and run your first script in Java using Playwright CLI.

item.title: Playwright - Web Automation Made Easier
item.description: An introduction to the hot cake in town - Playwright!

item.title: About Me
item.description: This is my personal journal where I write articles on QA and Automation. I enjoy the world of Quality Analysis and I have been a part of this domain since more than 12 years. I have been contributing towards the community by writing articles on various tools and concepts in the QA domain, mainly on web and mobile automation topics like Selenium, Java, TestNG, Karate and Reporting. For any feedback or comments regarding my blog, you can connect with me on my email: sonaldwivedi[@]hotmail[.]com

item.title: Jenkins integration with Bitbucket for Selenium project
item.description: Shows you how to integrate you Jenkins CI with a Bitbucket repo, which you can use in your Selenium project

item.title: Allure Reporting in Selenium using TestNG and Maven
item.description: Adding a reporting mechanism (Allure) to Selenium

item.title: Karate API automation
item.description: Introduction to testing APIs through Automation, using Karate tool.

item.title: How to Rerun Only Failed Testcases using TestNG
item.description: Part of the series related to writing testcases in TestNG

item.title: Installation of Eclipse on Ubuntu
item.description: How are we going to install Eclipse on Ubuntu? Part of a tutorial series.

item.title: Create and Read config.properties file in Java for Selenium
item.description: Describes the process of creating and reading config.properties file

item.title: Installation of JAVA onÂ Ubuntu
item.description: Part of series teaching you setup your Selenium automation-lab on Ubuntu
